verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Will Be Made Like <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens To <S%G3772><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Virgins, <S%G3933><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2985><s%> Their Lamps <S%G846><s%> <S%G1831><s%> Went Forth <S%G1519><s%> To Meet <S%G529><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom. <S%G3566><s%>
<S%G4002><s%> And Five <S%G1161><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Prudent, <S%G5429><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Foolish. <S%G3474><s%>

They Who Were <S%G3748><s%> Foolish, <S%G3474><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2985><s%> Their Lamps, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Take <S%G2983><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> , Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Oil; <S%G1637><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Prudent <S%G5429><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> Oil <S%G1637><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Vessels <S%G30><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2985><s%> Their Lamps. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G5549><s%> But Tarrying <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> They Became Drowsy <S%G3573><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Slept. <S%G2518><s%>

<S%G3319><s%> But In The Middle <S%G1161><s%> Of The Night <S%G3571><s%> A Cry <S%G2906><s%> There Was, <S%G1096><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> , Comes, <S%G2064><s%> <S%G1831><s%> Go Forth <S%G1519><s%> To Meet <S%G529><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Arose <S%G1453><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3933><s%> Those Virgins, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trimmed <S%G2885><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2985><s%> Their Lamps. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Foolish <S%G3474><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Prudent <S%G5429><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1637><s%> Your Oil, <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2985><s%> Our Lamps <S%G2257><s%> Are Going Out. <S%G4570><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answered <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prudent, <S%G5429><s%> Saying, No, <S%G3004><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> It May Suffice <S%G714><s%> For Us <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> You : <S%G5213><s%> <S%G4198><s%> But Go <S%G1161><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Sell, <S%G4453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Buy <S%G59><s%> For Yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G565><s%> But As Went Away <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> To Buy, <S%G59><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> Went In <S%G1525><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feast, <S%G1062><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Shut <S%G2808><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door. <S%G2374><s%>

<S%G5305><s%> And Afterwards <S%G1161><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G3062><s%> Virgins, <S%G3933><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Open <S%G455><s%> To Us. <S%G2254><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Do Not Know <S%G1492><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Do Not Know <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Comes. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G5618><s%> For It Is As If <S%G1063><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Leaving The Country <S%G589><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> His Property. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3739><s%> To One <S%G3303><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> <S%G5007><s%> Talents, <S%G3739><s%> And To Another <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1417><s%> Two, <S%G3739><s%> And To Another <S%G1161><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Respective <S%G2398><s%> Ability; <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left The Country <S%G589><s%> Immediately. <S%G2112><s%>

<S%G4198><s%> And Having Gone <S%G1161><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> Trafficked <S%G2038><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents. <S%G5007><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Who Received <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Gained <S%G2770><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Two. <S%G1417><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He Who <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> Dug <S%G3736><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hid <S%G613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of His Lord. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> And After <S%G1161><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> Long <S%G4183><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> Of Those Bondmen, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Takes <S%G4868><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Account. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> Received, <S%G2983><s%> Brought To Him <S%G4374><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents, <S%G5007><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Thou Didst Deliver : <S%G3860><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> Have I Gained <S%G2770><s%> ' Besides <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5346><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Well! <S%G2095><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful, <S%G4103><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> A Few Things <S%G3641><s%> Thou Wast <S%G2258><s%> , Faithful, <S%G4103><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Will I Set : <S%G2525><s%> Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Thy Lord. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G4334><s%> And Having Come To Him <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> , Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Thou Didst Deliver; <S%G3860><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Talents <S%G5007><s%> Have I Gained <S%G2770><s%> ' Besides <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord, <S%G846><s%> Well! <S%G2095><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful, <S%G4103><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> A Few Things <S%G3641><s%> Thou Wast <S%G2258><s%> , Faithful, <S%G4103><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Will I Set : <S%G2525><s%> Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Thy Lord. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G4334><s%> And Having Come To Him <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Talent <S%G5007><s%> Had Received <S%G2983><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I Know <S%G1097><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Hard <S%G4642><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> Reaping <S%G2325><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Sow, <S%G4687><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gathering <S%G4863><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Scatter, <S%G1287><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Being Afraid, <S%G5399><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> I Hid <S%G2928><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5007><s%> Thy Talent <S%G4675><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thine Own. <S%G4674><s%>

Answering <S%G611><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Slothful, <S%G3636><s%> Thou Knewest <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Reap <S%G2325><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Sowed Not, <S%G4687><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gather <S%G4863><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Scattered Not; <S%G1287><s%>

It Behoved <S%G1163><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Put <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G694><s%> My Money <S%G3450><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Money Changers, <S%G5133><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> I 1473 P-1NS 2865 V-AMI-1S Should Have Received 302 PRT 3588 T-ASN Mine Own 1699 S-1ASN With 4862 PREP Interest. 5110 N-DSM

Take <S%G142><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Talent, <S%G5007><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give It <S%G1325><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Talents. <S%G5007><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For Who <S%G1063><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> To Every One <S%G3956><s%> Shall Be Given, <S%G1325><s%> And He <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be In Abundance; <S%G4052><s%> From <S%G575><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Him Who <S%G3361><s%> Has Not, <S%G2192><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Taken <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Useless <S%G888><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Cast Ye Out <S%G1544><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outer : <S%G1857><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weeping <S%G2805><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gnashing <S%G1030><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Will He Sit <S%G2523><s%> Upon The <S%G1909><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Of His Glory, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Gathered <S%G4863><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Separate <S%G873><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherd <S%G4166><s%> Separates <S%G873><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Goats; <S%G2056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Will Set <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3303><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> On <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Goats <S%G2055><s%> On His <S%G1537><s%> Left. <S%G2176><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Will Say <S%G2046><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of My Father, <S%G3450><s%> Inherit <S%G2816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prepared <S%G2090><s%> For You <S%G5213><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World. <S%G2889><s%>

<S%G3983><s%> For I Hungered, <S%G1063><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Gave <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> To Eat; <S%G5315><s%> I Thirsted, <S%G1372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Gave To Drink <S%G4222><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> A Stranger <S%G3581><s%> I Was, <S%G2252><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Took In <S%G4863><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%>

Naked, <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Clothed <S%G4016><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> I Was Sick, <S%G770><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Visited <S%G1980><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> I Was, <S%G2252><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Will Answer <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Saw We <S%G1492><s%> Hungering, <S%G3983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fed Thee? <S%G5142><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Thirsting, <S%G1372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave Thee To Drink? <S%G4222><s%>

<S%G4219><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Saw We <S%G1492><s%> A Stranger, <S%G3581><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Took Thee In? <S%G4863><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Naked, <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Clothed Thee? <S%G4016><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Will Say <S%G2046><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> ' <S%G1909><s%> Inasmuch As <S%G3745><s%> Ye Did It <S%G4160><s%> To One <S%G1520><s%> Of These <S%G5130><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Least, <S%G1646><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> Ye Did It. <S%G4160><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Will He Say <S%G2046><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G1537><s%> Left, <S%G2176><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cursed, <S%G2672><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Prepared <S%G2090><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels. <S%G846><s%>
